item.title: How Does 'Sex Guru' With Million Followers Go on Run?
item.description:
news.yahoo.com
Photo Illustration by The Daily Beast/GettyTo hear him tell it, there isn’t much that self-proclaimed “godman” Paramahamsa Nithyananda can’t do with his alleged supernatural powers. Want to hear a cow or monkey speak Sanskrit? He’s your man. Heal the blind? Check. ESP, stop sunrise, see through walls? The swami says he can do all these and more.
